name: Torchlight (itch) (SpellMender)
description:
Weeky Game Jam #168
Theme: Pass The Torch

Press "A" and "D" to move
Press "R" to reset the current level.

Play as a father, his daughter, and her little boy. Each of you is a little different. The three of you must work together. Pass the torch between you to make your way through platforming puzzles, and discover where you must take the Torchlight.

This game is dedicated to my wife
In memory of her grandmother

Credits:
DartBoardGamer - Unity Engineer
Tsujimoto - Level Music
JSM - Cutscene Music
Lenoomu - SFX
